name: Zero Proof: Creamsicle Milkshake
description: I haven't seen a Creamsicle in years, but the creamy orange and vanilla combination is a flavor memory I refuse to forget. I could certainly make my own Creamsicle pops by blending ice cream and sherbet together and refreezing, but a milkshake is just as satisfying and takes a fraction of the time.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to blender and mix until thoroughly combined.
Pour into serving glasses and garnish with orange slices.
